messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the typical number of spells known by a Tcho-Tcho priest or acolyte?
At least three
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for a Tcho-Tcho's unarmed fighting attacks?
1D3 + damage bonus
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Tcho-Tcho's dodge percentage?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Tcho-Tcho's average magic points?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Tcho-Tcho's attack damage range?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Tcho-Tcho's average damage bonus from weapon type?
None
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the phrase coined by H.P. Lovecraft to describe the Old Ones?
The Old Ones were, the Old Ones are, and the Old Ones shall be.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the relationship between the alien races of the Cthulhu Mythos and the Mythos gods?
The alien races of the Cthulhu Mythos are horrifying because they do not care about the fate of humanity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an avatar in the context of this text?
A specific form, sometimes with specific attributes, in which a portion of a god may appear.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many avatars is Nyarlathotep particularly well known for?
His thousand avatars (or masks).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the term used to mean not only gods but also those with godlike powers?
Deity.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Great Cthulhu believed to be by many?
Part of an alien race.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are Great Old Ones distinguished from actual gods?
As Elder Gods, Other Gods, Outer Gods, etc.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Lovecraft's approach to defining the Mythos gods?
Inconsistent in his use of these entities, just as real world myths have inconsistencies and contradictions.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How should the Keeper make decisions about the gods in their story?
The Keeper should feel empowered to make their own decisions about what fits their story, and which gods they wish to use and how.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of listing characteristic values for each deity?
These values are included only to give a sense of scale and completeness.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the values of the gods be lowered or raised according to the scenario and the Keeper's requirements?
Yes, these values may be raised or lowered according to the scenario and the Keeper's requirements.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why defining the gods too closely may be counterproductive?
Defining them too closely may prove counterproductive because these matters are meant to be beyond man's understanding.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do the values of the gods compare to those of an investigator?
These values are often so large when compared with those of an investigator that they may cease to have any useful relevance.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the role of the Keeper's requirements in adjusting the values of the gods?
The Keeper's requirements may influence the values of the gods by raising or lowering them according to the scenario.
